Did you notice how similar Z space and Transwarpspace
are. They could easily be one and the same (unless you
have a discription of transwarpspace opposed to the
whole "the universe is a cylinder of time and space"
idea). I would really want one of those huge things on
the Andalites homeworld mentioned in "The Ellimist
Chronicles".

--- Legendarynemasis@... wrote:
> Exactly, if they got to cybertron it would be a
> waste to just keep the there. 
> You have to make it more interesting, include
> various planets, new enemies 
> and such. 
>
